name: Maserati
0:
”Alexa, ask Maserati to check the tire pressure of my car.”
”Alexa, ask Maserati how much gas is in my car.”
”Alexa, ask Maserati to find the nearest gas station.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: maserati
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Command your Maserati from the comfort of your home using only your voice. 
Simply ask Alexa on an Alexa-enabled device to check fuel levels, tyre pressure and more.
In combination with the Maserati Guide and Drive Services, you can also ask Alexa to find restaurants, petrol stations and other destinations and then send the addresses directly to your vehicle for added convenience.

SUPPORTED VEHICLES

Maseratied Vehicles.

• Maserati Ghibli MY21 and newer
• Maserati Quattroporte MY21 and newer
• Maserati Levante MY21 and newer
• Maserati MC20
• Maserati Grecale
• Maserati GranTurismo

EQUIPMENT REQUIREMENTS

Must have a valid Maserati account.

REQUIREMENTS

Available in selected countries only as per Maserati and Amazon Alexa’s countries.

SAMPLE COMMANDS

• “Alexa, ask Maserati to check the tyre pressure of my car.”
• “Alexa, ask Maserati how much fuel is in my car.”
• “Alexa, ask Maserati the oil level of my car.”
• “Alexa, ask Maserati to flash the lights of my car.”
• “Alexa, ask Maserati to find the nearest service station.”

To get a complete list of commands say: “Alexa, ask Maserati for help with my car.”

SETUP INSTRUCTIONS

To link your Maserati system to Amazon Alexa:

1. Download the Amazon Alexa app on your iPhone or Android.
2. Launch the app, then tap MENU, and go to SKILLS.
3. Search for Maserati; then select by tapping ENABLE.
4. Select LINK ACCOUNT.
5. Log in using your Maserati Owner account ID and password.


For more information, visit https://connect.maserati.com/gb/en/faq. 

Remote Vehicle Start is not available in all countries. You are responsible for using remote features in accordance with any laws, rules or ordinances in effect in your vehicle’s location. You must have an active subscription to Maserati™ in order to use remote services. See Terms of Service for service limitations.
